VectorGenerator Class Reference

This class is the virtual base class for classes used to generate random 3D vectors. More...

Detailed Description

This class is the virtual base class for classes used to generate random 3D vectors.

VectorGenerator * VectorGenerator::parseFromPython ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

This method creates a vector generator from Python arguments.

It uses the parsePythonTuple static methods of each of its children in order to parse the details.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. This should be a list with a string for the head. The string represents the type of the vector generator desired. The tail of the list is passed to the specific generator to be parsed further.
Returns:
A pointer to the newly created vector generator if everything was created without problems. NULL, otherwise.
